item.title: Budget
item.description: Overview The budget is where you can list all the resources you think you’ll need for the project. Basically, this is the place where you try define (for a project): How many people you need; Which experience levelsÂ you need; Which tasks are needed to get the job done; Who will do what; The external costs; The selling price. Done? Now the budget must be approved by a supervisor and, once approved, the project manager can start [planning](/planning/index/) and creating [orders](/finance/index/#orders).
